properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    WITH MD_FCTRY_CAL AS (
  SELECT
    '{Config.sourceSystem}' AS  AS SRC_SYS_CD,
    CAL_NUM,
    CAL_YR,
    CAL_DATE,
    WORK_DAY,(BASIS + CUMSUM) AS FACTORY_DAY,
 CASE
      WHEN WORK_DAY = 0 THEN (BASIS + CUMSUM + 1)
      ELSE (BASIS + CUMSUM)
    END AS FACTORY_DAY_NEXT
  FROM
    (
      select
        CAL_NUM,
        CAL_YR,
        CAL_DATE,
        BASIS,
        WORK_DAY,
        SUM(WORK_DAY) over (
          PARTITION BY (CAL_NUM, CAL_YR)
          ORDER BY
            CAL_NUM ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING
            AND CURRENT ROW
        ) CUMSUM
      from
        (
          WITH RAW_DATA AS (
            SELECT
              *
            FROM
              {Config.sourceDatabase}.tfacs tfacs
            WHERE
              tfacs._deleted_ = 'F'
          ),
          VALS_AS_COLS_1 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              BASIS,
              '01' AS MONTH,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 1, 1) AS Day_1,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 2, 1) AS Day_2,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 3, 1) AS Day_3,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 4, 1) AS Day_4,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 5, 1) AS Day_5,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 6, 1) AS Day_6,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 7, 1) AS Day_7,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 8, 1) AS Day_8,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 9, 1) AS Day_9,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 10, 1) AS Day_10,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 11, 1) AS Day_11,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 12, 1) AS Day_12,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 13, 1) AS Day_13,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 14, 1) AS Day_14,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 15, 1) AS Day_15,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 16, 1) AS Day_16,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 17, 1) AS Day_17,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 18, 1) AS Day_18,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 19, 1) AS Day_19,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 20, 1) AS Day_20,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 21, 1) AS Day_21,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 22, 1) AS Day_22,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 23, 1) AS Day_23,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 24, 1) AS Day_24,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 25, 1) AS Day_25,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 26, 1) AS Day_26,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 27, 1) AS Day_27,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 28, 1) AS Day_28,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 29, 1) AS Day_29,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 30, 1) AS Day_30,
              SUBSTRING(MON01, 31, 1) AS Day_31
            FROM
              RAW_DATA
          ),
          TRANSPOSE_1 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              MONTH,
              BASIS,
              row_number() OVER (
                PARTITION BY JAHR,
                MONTH,
                IDENT
                ORDER BY
                  JAHR,
                  MONTH,
                  IDENT
              ) Day,
              STACK(
                31,
                Day_1,
                Day_2,
                Day_3,
                Day_4,
                Day_5,
                Day_6,
                Day_7,
                Day_8,
                Day_9,
                Day_10,
                Day_11,
                Day_12,
                Day_13,
                Day_14,
                Day_15,
                Day_16,
                Day_17,
                Day_18,
                Day_19,
                Day_20,
                Day_21,
                Day_22,
                Day_23,
                Day_24,
                Day_25,
                Day_26,
                Day_27,
                Day_28,
                Day_29,
                Day_30,
                Day_31
              ) work_day
            FROM
              VALS_AS_COLS_1
          ),
          VALS_AS_COLS_2 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              BASIS,
              '02' AS MONTH,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 1, 1) AS Day_1,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 2, 1) AS Day_2,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 3, 1) AS Day_3,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 4, 1) AS Day_4,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 5, 1) AS Day_5,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 6, 1) AS Day_6,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 7, 1) AS Day_7,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 8, 1) AS Day_8,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 9, 1) AS Day_9,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 10, 1) AS Day_10,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 11, 1) AS Day_11,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 12, 1) AS Day_12,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 13, 1) AS Day_13,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 14, 1) AS Day_14,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 15, 1) AS Day_15,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 16, 1) AS Day_16,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 17, 1) AS Day_17,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 18, 1) AS Day_18,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 19, 1) AS Day_19,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 20, 1) AS Day_20,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 21, 1) AS Day_21,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 22, 1) AS Day_22,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 23, 1) AS Day_23,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 24, 1) AS Day_24,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 25, 1) AS Day_25,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 26, 1) AS Day_26,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 27, 1) AS Day_27,
              SUBSTRING(MON02, 28, 1) AS Day_28,
     CASE WHEN ((JAHR % 4 = 0 AND JAHR % 100 <> 0) OR JAHR % 400 = 0) THEN SUBSTRING(MON02, 29, 1) ELSE NULL END AS Day_29
            FROM
              RAW_DATA
          ),
          TRANSPOSE_2 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              MONTH,
              BASIS,
              row_number() OVER (
                PARTITION BY JAHR,
                MONTH,
                IDENT
                ORDER BY
                  JAHR,
                  MONTH,
                  IDENT
              ) Day,
              STACK(
                29,
                Day_1,
                Day_2,
                Day_3,
                Day_4,
                Day_5,
                Day_6,
                Day_7,
                Day_8,
                Day_9,
                Day_10,
                Day_11,
                Day_12,
                Day_13,
                Day_14,
                Day_15,
                Day_16,
                Day_17,
                Day_18,
                Day_19,
                Day_20,
                Day_21,
                Day_22,
                Day_23,
                Day_24,
                Day_25,
                Day_26,
                Day_27,
                Day_28,
    Day_29
              ) work_day
            FROM
              VALS_AS_COLS_2
          ),
          VALS_AS_COLS_3 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              BASIS,
              '03' AS MONTH,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 1, 1) AS Day_1,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 2, 1) AS Day_2,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 3, 1) AS Day_3,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 4, 1) AS Day_4,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 5, 1) AS Day_5,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 6, 1) AS Day_6,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 7, 1) AS Day_7,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 8, 1) AS Day_8,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 9, 1) AS Day_9,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 10, 1) AS Day_10,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 11, 1) AS Day_11,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 12, 1) AS Day_12,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 13, 1) AS Day_13,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 14, 1) AS Day_14,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 15, 1) AS Day_15,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 16, 1) AS Day_16,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 17, 1) AS Day_17,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 18, 1) AS Day_18,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 19, 1) AS Day_19,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 20, 1) AS Day_20,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 21, 1) AS Day_21,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 22, 1) AS Day_22,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 23, 1) AS Day_23,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 24, 1) AS Day_24,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 25, 1) AS Day_25,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 26, 1) AS Day_26,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 27, 1) AS Day_27,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 28, 1) AS Day_28,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 29, 1) AS Day_29,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 30, 1) AS Day_30,
              SUBSTRING(MON03, 31, 1) AS Day_31
            FROM
              RAW_DATA
          ),
          TRANSPOSE_3 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              MONTH,
              BASIS,
              row_number() OVER (
                PARTITION BY JAHR,
                MONTH,
                IDENT
                ORDER BY
                  JAHR,
                  MONTH,
                  IDENT
              ) Day,
              STACK(
                31,
                Day_1,
                Day_2,
                Day_3,
                Day_4,
                Day_5,
                Day_6,
                Day_7,
                Day_8,
                Day_9,
                Day_10,
                Day_11,
                Day_12,
                Day_13,
                Day_14,
                Day_15,
                Day_16,
                Day_17,
                Day_18,
                Day_19,
                Day_20,
                Day_21,
                Day_22,
                Day_23,
                Day_24,
                Day_25,
                Day_26,
                Day_27,
                Day_28,
                Day_29,
                Day_30,
                Day_31
              ) work_day
            FROM
              VALS_AS_COLS_3
          ),
          VALS_AS_COLS_4 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              BASIS,
              '04' AS MONTH,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 1, 1) AS Day_1,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 2, 1) AS Day_2,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 3, 1) AS Day_3,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 4, 1) AS Day_4,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 5, 1) AS Day_5,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 6, 1) AS Day_6,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 7, 1) AS Day_7,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 8, 1) AS Day_8,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 9, 1) AS Day_9,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 10, 1) AS Day_10,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 11, 1) AS Day_11,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 12, 1) AS Day_12,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 13, 1) AS Day_13,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 14, 1) AS Day_14,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 15, 1) AS Day_15,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 16, 1) AS Day_16,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 17, 1) AS Day_17,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 18, 1) AS Day_18,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 19, 1) AS Day_19,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 20, 1) AS Day_20,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 21, 1) AS Day_21,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 22, 1) AS Day_22,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 23, 1) AS Day_23,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 24, 1) AS Day_24,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 25, 1) AS Day_25,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 26, 1) AS Day_26,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 27, 1) AS Day_27,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 28, 1) AS Day_28,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 29, 1) AS Day_29,
              SUBSTRING(MON04, 30, 1) AS Day_30
            FROM
              RAW_DATA
          ),
          TRANSPOSE_4 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              MONTH,
              BASIS,
              row_number() OVER (
                PARTITION BY JAHR,
                MONTH,
                IDENT
                ORDER BY
                  JAHR,
                  MONTH,
                  IDENT
              ) Day,
              STACK(
                30,
                Day_1,
                Day_2,
                Day_3,
                Day_4,
                Day_5,
                Day_6,
                Day_7,
                Day_8,
                Day_9,
                Day_10,
                Day_11,
                Day_12,
                Day_13,
                Day_14,
                Day_15,
                Day_16,
                Day_17,
                Day_18,
                Day_19,
                Day_20,
                Day_21,
                Day_22,
                Day_23,
                Day_24,
                Day_25,
                Day_26,
                Day_27,
                Day_28,
                Day_29,
                Day_30
              ) work_day
            FROM
              VALS_AS_COLS_4
          ),
          VALS_AS_COLS_5 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              BASIS,
              '05' AS MONTH,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 1, 1) AS Day_1,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 2, 1) AS Day_2,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 3, 1) AS Day_3,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 4, 1) AS Day_4,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 5, 1) AS Day_5,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 6, 1) AS Day_6,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 7, 1) AS Day_7,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 8, 1) AS Day_8,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 9, 1) AS Day_9,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 10, 1) AS Day_10,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 11, 1) AS Day_11,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 12, 1) AS Day_12,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 13, 1) AS Day_13,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 14, 1) AS Day_14,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 15, 1) AS Day_15,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 16, 1) AS Day_16,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 17, 1) AS Day_17,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 18, 1) AS Day_18,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 19, 1) AS Day_19,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 20, 1) AS Day_20,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 21, 1) AS Day_21,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 22, 1) AS Day_22,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 23, 1) AS Day_23,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 24, 1) AS Day_24,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 25, 1) AS Day_25,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 26, 1) AS Day_26,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 27, 1) AS Day_27,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 28, 1) AS Day_28,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 29, 1) AS Day_29,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 30, 1) AS Day_30,
              SUBSTRING(MON05, 31, 1) AS Day_31
            FROM
              RAW_DATA
          ),
          TRANSPOSE_5 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              MONTH,
              BASIS,
              row_number() OVER (
                PARTITION BY JAHR,
                MONTH,
                IDENT
                ORDER BY
                  JAHR,
                  MONTH,
                  IDENT
              ) Day,
              STACK(
                31,
                Day_1,
                Day_2,
                Day_3,
                Day_4,
                Day_5,
                Day_6,
                Day_7,
                Day_8,
                Day_9,
                Day_10,
                Day_11,
                Day_12,
                Day_13,
                Day_14,
                Day_15,
                Day_16,
                Day_17,
                Day_18,
                Day_19,
                Day_20,
                Day_21,
                Day_22,
                Day_23,
                Day_24,
                Day_25,
                Day_26,
                Day_27,
                Day_28,
                Day_29,
                Day_30,
                Day_31
              ) work_day
            FROM
              VALS_AS_COLS_5
          ),
          VALS_AS_COLS_6 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              BASIS,
              '06' AS MONTH,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 1, 1) AS Day_1,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 2, 1) AS Day_2,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 3, 1) AS Day_3,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 4, 1) AS Day_4,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 5, 1) AS Day_5,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 6, 1) AS Day_6,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 7, 1) AS Day_7,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 8, 1) AS Day_8,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 9, 1) AS Day_9,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 10, 1) AS Day_10,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 11, 1) AS Day_11,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 12, 1) AS Day_12,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 13, 1) AS Day_13,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 14, 1) AS Day_14,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 15, 1) AS Day_15,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 16, 1) AS Day_16,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 17, 1) AS Day_17,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 18, 1) AS Day_18,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 19, 1) AS Day_19,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 20, 1) AS Day_20,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 21, 1) AS Day_21,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 22, 1) AS Day_22,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 23, 1) AS Day_23,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 24, 1) AS Day_24,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 25, 1) AS Day_25,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 26, 1) AS Day_26,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 27, 1) AS Day_27,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 28, 1) AS Day_28,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 29, 1) AS Day_29,
              SUBSTRING(MON06, 30, 1) AS Day_30
            FROM
              RAW_DATA
          ),
          TRANSPOSE_6 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              MONTH,
              BASIS,
              row_number() OVER (
                PARTITION BY JAHR,
                MONTH,
                IDENT
                ORDER BY
                  JAHR,
                  MONTH,
                  IDENT
              ) Day,
              STACK(
                30,
                Day_1,
                Day_2,
                Day_3,
                Day_4,
                Day_5,
                Day_6,
                Day_7,
                Day_8,
                Day_9,
                Day_10,
                Day_11,
                Day_12,
                Day_13,
                Day_14,
                Day_15,
                Day_16,
                Day_17,
                Day_18,
                Day_19,
                Day_20,
                Day_21,
                Day_22,
                Day_23,
                Day_24,
                Day_25,
                Day_26,
                Day_27,
                Day_28,
                Day_29,
                Day_30
              ) work_day
            FROM
              VALS_AS_COLS_6
          ),
          VALS_AS_COLS_7 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              BASIS,
              '07' AS MONTH,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 1, 1) AS Day_1,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 2, 1) AS Day_2,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 3, 1) AS Day_3,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 4, 1) AS Day_4,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 5, 1) AS Day_5,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 6, 1) AS Day_6,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 7, 1) AS Day_7,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 8, 1) AS Day_8,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 9, 1) AS Day_9,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 10, 1) AS Day_10,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 11, 1) AS Day_11,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 12, 1) AS Day_12,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 13, 1) AS Day_13,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 14, 1) AS Day_14,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 15, 1) AS Day_15,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 16, 1) AS Day_16,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 17, 1) AS Day_17,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 18, 1) AS Day_18,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 19, 1) AS Day_19,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 20, 1) AS Day_20,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 21, 1) AS Day_21,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 22, 1) AS Day_22,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 23, 1) AS Day_23,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 24, 1) AS Day_24,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 25, 1) AS Day_25,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 26, 1) AS Day_26,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 27, 1) AS Day_27,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 28, 1) AS Day_28,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 29, 1) AS Day_29,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 30, 1) AS Day_30,
              SUBSTRING(MON07, 31, 1) AS Day_31
            FROM

          ),
          TRANSPOSE_7 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              MONTH,
              BASIS,
              row_number() OVER (
                PARTITION BY JAHR,
                MONTH,
                IDENT
                ORDER BY
                  JAHR,
                  MONTH,
                  IDENT
              ) Day,
              STACK(
                31,
                Day_1,
                Day_2,
                Day_3,
                Day_4,
                Day_5,
                Day_6,

          ),
          VALS_AS_COLS_8 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              BASIS,
              '08' AS MONTH,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 1, 1) AS Day_1,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 2, 1) AS Day_2,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 3, 1) AS Day_3,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 4, 1) AS Day_4,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 5, 1) AS Day_5,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 6, 1) AS Day_6,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 7, 1) AS Day_7,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 8, 1) AS Day_8,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 9, 1) AS Day_9,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 10, 1) AS Day_10,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 11, 1) AS Day_11,

              SUBSTRING(MON08, 13, 1) AS Day_13,

              SUBSTRING(MON08, 20, 1) AS Day_20,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 21, 1) AS Day_21,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 22, 1) AS Day_22,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 23, 1) AS Day_23,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 24, 1) AS Day_24,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 25, 1) AS Day_25,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 26, 1) AS Day_26,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 27, 1) AS Day_27,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 28, 1) AS Day_28,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 29, 1) AS Day_29,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 30, 1) AS Day_30,
              SUBSTRING(MON08, 31, 1) AS Day_31
            FROM

          ),

              IDENT,

              MONTH,

              row_number() OVER (
                PARTITION BY JAHR,
                MONTH,
                IDENT

                Day_27,
                Day_28,
                Day_29,
                Day_30,
                Day_31
              ) work_day
            FROM
              VALS_AS_COLS_8
          ),
          VALS_AS_COLS_9 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              BASIS,
              '09' AS MONTH,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 1, 1) AS Day_1,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 2, 1) AS Day_2,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 3, 1) AS Day_3,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 4, 1) AS Day_4,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 5, 1) AS Day_5,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 6, 1) AS Day_6,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 7, 1) AS Day_7,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 8, 1) AS Day_8,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 9, 1) AS Day_9,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 10, 1) AS Day_10,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 11, 1) AS Day_11,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 12, 1) AS Day_12,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 13, 1) AS Day_13,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 14, 1) AS Day_14,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 15, 1) AS Day_15,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 16, 1) AS Day_16,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 17, 1) AS Day_17,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 18, 1) AS Day_18,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 19, 1) AS Day_19,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 20, 1) AS Day_20,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 21, 1) AS Day_21,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 22, 1) AS Day_22,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 23, 1) AS Day_23,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 24, 1) AS Day_24,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 25, 1) AS Day_25,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 26, 1) AS Day_26,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 27, 1) AS Day_27,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 28, 1) AS Day_28,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 29, 1) AS Day_29,
              SUBSTRING(MON09, 30, 1) AS Day_30
            FROM
              RAW_DATA
          ),
          TRANSPOSE_9 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              MONTH,
              BASIS,
              row_number() OVER (
                PARTITION BY JAHR,
                MONTH,
                IDENT
                ORDER BY
                  JAHR,
                  MONTH,
                  IDENT
              ) Day,
              STACK(
                30,
                Day_1,
                Day_2,
                Day_3,
                Day_4,
                Day_5,
                Day_6,
                Day_7,
                Day_8,
                Day_9,
                Day_10,
                Day_11,
                Day_12,
                Day_13,
                Day_14,
                Day_15,
                Day_16,
                Day_17,
                Day_18,
                Day_19,
                Day_20,
                Day_21,
                Day_22,
                Day_23,
                Day_24,
                Day_25,
                Day_26,
                Day_27,
                Day_28,
                Day_29,
                Day_30
              ) work_day
            FROM
              VALS_AS_COLS_9
          ),
          VALS_AS_COLS_10 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              BASIS,
              '10' AS MONTH,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 1, 1) AS Day_1,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 2, 1) AS Day_2,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 3, 1) AS Day_3,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 4, 1) AS Day_4,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 5, 1) AS Day_5,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 6, 1) AS Day_6,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 7, 1) AS Day_7,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 8, 1) AS Day_8,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 9, 1) AS Day_9,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 10, 1) AS Day_10,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 11, 1) AS Day_11,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 12, 1) AS Day_12,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 13, 1) AS Day_13,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 14, 1) AS Day_14,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 15, 1) AS Day_15,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 16, 1) AS Day_16,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 17, 1) AS Day_17,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 18, 1) AS Day_18,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 19, 1) AS Day_19,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 20, 1) AS Day_20,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 21, 1) AS Day_21,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 22, 1) AS Day_22,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 23, 1) AS Day_23,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 24, 1) AS Day_24,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 25, 1) AS Day_25,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 26, 1) AS Day_26,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 27, 1) AS Day_27,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 28, 1) AS Day_28,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 29, 1) AS Day_29,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 30, 1) AS Day_30,
              SUBSTRING(MON10, 31, 1) AS Day_31
            FROM
              RAW_DATA
          ),
          TRANSPOSE_10 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              MONTH,
              BASIS,
              row_number() OVER (
                PARTITION BY JAHR,
                MONTH,
                IDENT
                ORDER BY
                  JAHR,
                  MONTH,
                  IDENT
              ) Day,
              STACK(
                31,
                Day_1,
                Day_2,
                Day_3,
                Day_4,
                Day_5,
                Day_6,
                Day_7,
                Day_8,
                Day_9,
                Day_10,
                Day_11,
                Day_12,
                Day_13,
                Day_14,
                Day_15,
                Day_16,
                Day_17,
                Day_18,
                Day_19,
                Day_20,
                Day_21,
                Day_22,
                Day_23,
                Day_24,
                Day_25,
                Day_26,
                Day_27,
                Day_28,
                Day_29,
                Day_30,
                Day_31
              ) work_day
            FROM
              VALS_AS_COLS_10
          ),
          VALS_AS_COLS_11 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              BASIS,
              '11' AS MONTH,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 1, 1) AS Day_1,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 2, 1) AS Day_2,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 3, 1) AS Day_3,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 4, 1) AS Day_4,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 5, 1) AS Day_5,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 6, 1) AS Day_6,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 7, 1) AS Day_7,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 8, 1) AS Day_8,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 9, 1) AS Day_9,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 10, 1) AS Day_10,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 11, 1) AS Day_11,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 12, 1) AS Day_12,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 13, 1) AS Day_13,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 14, 1) AS Day_14,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 15, 1) AS Day_15,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 16, 1) AS Day_16,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 17, 1) AS Day_17,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 18, 1) AS Day_18,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 19, 1) AS Day_19,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 20, 1) AS Day_20,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 21, 1) AS Day_21,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 22, 1) AS Day_22,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 23, 1) AS Day_23,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 24, 1) AS Day_24,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 25, 1) AS Day_25,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 26, 1) AS Day_26,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 27, 1) AS Day_27,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 28, 1) AS Day_28,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 29, 1) AS Day_29,
              SUBSTRING(MON11, 30, 1) AS Day_30
            FROM
              RAW_DATA
          ),
          TRANSPOSE_11 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
        MONTH,
              BASIS,
              row_number() OVER (
                PARTITION BY JAHR,
                MONTH,
                IDENT
                ORDER BY
                  JAHR,
                  MONTH,
                  IDENT
              ) Day,
              STACK(
                30,
                Day_1,
                Day_2,
                Day_3,
                Day_4,
                Day_5,
                Day_6,
                Day_7,
                Day_8,
                Day_9,
                Day_10,
                Day_11,
                Day_12,
                Day_13,
                Day_14,
                Day_15,
                Day_16,
                Day_17,
                Day_18,
                Day_19,
                Day_20,
                Day_21,
                Day_22,
                Day_23,
                Day_24,
                Day_25,
                Day_26,
                Day_27,
                Day_28,
                Day_29,
                Day_30
              ) work_day
            FROM
              VALS_AS_COLS_11
          ),
          VALS_AS_COLS_12 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
              BASIS,
              '12' AS MONTH,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 1, 1) AS Day_1,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 2, 1) AS Day_2,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 3, 1) AS Day_3,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 4, 1) AS Day_4,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 5, 1) AS Day_5,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 6, 1) AS Day_6,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 7, 1) AS Day_7,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 8, 1) AS Day_8,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 9, 1) AS Day_9,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 10, 1) AS Day_10,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 11, 1) AS Day_11,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 12, 1) AS Day_12,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 13, 1) AS Day_13,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 14, 1) AS Day_14,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 15, 1) AS Day_15,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 16, 1) AS Day_16,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 17, 1) AS Day_17,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 18, 1) AS Day_18,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 19, 1) AS Day_19,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 20, 1) AS Day_20,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 21, 1) AS Day_21,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 22, 1) AS Day_22,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 23, 1) AS Day_23,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 24, 1) AS Day_24,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 25, 1) AS Day_25,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 26, 1) AS Day_26,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 27, 1) AS Day_27,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 28, 1) AS Day_28,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 29, 1) AS Day_29,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 30, 1) AS Day_30,
              SUBSTRING(MON12, 31, 1) AS Day_31
            FROM
              RAW_DATA
          ),
          TRANSPOSE_12 AS (
            SELECT
              IDENT,
              JAHR,
     MONTH,
              BASIS,
              row_number() OVER (
                PARTITION BY JAHR,
                MONTH,
                IDENT
                ORDER BY
                  JAHR,
                  MONTH,
                  IDENT
              ) Day,
              STACK(
                31,
                Day_1,
                Day_2,
                Day_3,
                Day_4,
                Day_5,
                Day_6,
                Day_7,
                Day_8,
                Day_9,
                Day_10,
                Day_11,
                Day_12,
                Day_13,
                Day_14,
                Day_15,
                Day_16,
                Day_17,
                Day_18,
                Day_19,
                Day_20,
                Day_21,
                Day_22,
                Day_23,
                Day_24,
                Day_25,
                Day_26,
                Day_27,
                Day_28,
                Day_29,
                Day_30,
                Day_31
              ) work_day
            FROM
              VALS_AS_COLS_12
          ),
          UNION_ALL AS (
            SELECT
              *
            FROM
              TRANSPOSE_1
            UNION
            SELECT
              *
            FROM
              TRANSPOSE_2
            UNION
            SELECT
              *
            FROM
              TRANSPOSE_3
            UNION
            SELECT
              *
            FROM
              TRANSPOSE_4
            UNION
            SELECT
              *
            FROM
              TRANSPOSE_5
            UNION
            SELECT
              *
            FROM
              TRANSPOSE_6
            UNION
            SELECT
              *
            FROM
              TRANSPOSE_7
            UNION
            SELECT
              *
            FROM
              TRANSPOSE_8
            UNION
            SELECT
              *
            FROM
              TRANSPOSE_9
            UNION
            SELECT
              *
            FROM
              TRANSPOSE_10
            UNION
            SELECT
              *
            FROM
              TRANSPOSE_11
            UNION
            SELECT
              *
            FROM
              TRANSPOSE_12
          )
          SELECT
            IDENT AS CAL_NUM,
            JAHR AS CAL_YR,
            BASIS,
            CASE
              WHEN DAY < 10 THEN CONCAT(JAHR, MONTH, '0', DAY)
              ELSE CONCAT (JAHR, MONTH, DAY)
            END AS CAL_DATE,
            work_day AS WORK_DAY
          FROM
            UNION_ALL
   WHERE WORK_DAY IS NOT NULL
          ORDER BY
            IDENT,
            JAHR,
            MONTH,
            Day
        )
    )
)
select
  a.SRC_SYS_CD,
  a.CAL_NUM,
  CAST(a.CAL_YR AS INT) AS CAL_YR,
  CAST(a.CAL_DATE AS INT) AS CAL_DATE,
  CAST(a.WORK_DAY AS INT) AS WORK_DAY,
  CAST(a.FACTORY_DAY AS INT) AS FACTORY_DAY,
  CASE
    WHEN a.WORK_DAY = '1' then CAST(a.CAL_DATE AS INT)
    ELSE CAST(MIN(b.CAL_DATE) AS INT)
  END AS FACTORY_DATE,
  CAST(a.FACTORY_DAY_NEXT AS INT) AS FACTORY_DAY_NEXT
FROM
  MD_FCTRY_CAL a
  LEFT JOIN MD_FCTRY_CAL b ON b.CAL_NUM = a.CAL_NUM
  AND b.CAL_DATE > a.CAL_DATE
  AND b.WORK_DAY = '1'
GROUP BY
  a.SRC_SYS_CD,
  a.CAL_NUM,
  a.CAL_YR,
  a.CAL_DATE,
  a.WORK_DAY,
  a.FACTORY_DAY,
  a.FACTORY_DAY_NEXT
ORDER BY
  a.CAL_NUM,
  a.CAL_YR,
  a.CAL_DATE  
 
""")
